item.title: New Container: Paperless-ng
item.description: We have released a new container for Paperless-ng! Paperless-ng is an application by Daniel Quinn and contributors that indexes your scanned documents and allows you to easily search for documents and store metadata alongside your documents."
item.content:
We have released a new container for Paperless-ng!

Paperless-ng is an application by Daniel Quinn and contributors that indexes your scanned documents and allows you to easily search for documents and store metadata alongside your documents."
